page.title: 10A DAY ON THE DOLE
page.content: HEBBURN After spending over twenty years working in the shipyards,i am now unemployed.My day to day activities and lifestyle bear little resemblance to when I was working.The disciplined pattern of starting work at 7.30 am and arriving home at 5.00 pm has changed dramatically.A typical day now will ential getting up at 8.00 am to ensure the children get to school on time and my wife gets to work.I will then attend to some of the household chores such as washing up, cleaning etc.Next a visit to the newsagent and do any shopping that is necessary. One of the dubious advantages of being on the dole is that you have more time to do things like gardening, which i enjoy. Asuming that it is Monday then I visit the Department of Employment,
